ovdesc.p: Allows the user to specify the fields that are to be compared for a record that is specified in the application MODULE.COMPARE.DETS

desc.p: If the compare field forms a part of a multivalue set, then the base field on which the multivalue is dependant can be specified here. Upto 35 characters are allowed.
The Criteria for selection of records for comparison can be specified here. Upto 35 characters are allowed. Eg: @ID LIKE MBGLâ€¦

ID of the record has to be given as <ID of MODULE.COMPARE.DET>*<Filename specified in MODULE.COMPARE.DET>. For each file name specified, in the MODULE.COMPARE.DETS Record, the comparison details can be specified in this application. Upto 35 characters are allowed.
Should be a valid routine name. An entry in the PGM.FILE with type 'S' is checked. Upto 35 characters are allowed.
Text for description. Mandatory Field .Upto 35 characters are allowed.

Used to specify the field names that are to be picked up for comparison. The sequence of fields in both the export and import areas should be the same.Should be a valid field in the application specified in the ID. Mandatory Field upto 35 characters are allowed.
